Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style patterned pottery chalice with cul and part of handle; white slip; interior: glazed streaky brown; traces of two bands in added white; exterior: at left, part of vertical stroke from metope pattern; handle streaky brown; below handle, traces of band in black; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0919) (phase 2)
